subject: Dear  Sir
body:
Dear  Sir
How are you and your family hope fine?, l am Mark Opoku from Syria
now in TOGO LOME as i am explaining to you  i have one million DOLLARS  in
my position, i want to send to you in your country so that you can use the
money to invest for me in any profitable business in your country
under your care, because I have lost some of my money through all
those diplomat, so now i am sending you this money from Togo Lome
western union with a powerful barrister that is helping all
beneficiary to transfer their funds now from Togo Lome 
i want you now
to send to me a receivers name so that we can start sending you the
funds gradually.
Best Regards,
Mark Opoku

subject: Re: Dear  Sir
body:
Hello Mark,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your offer to send me the money for investment. Can you please provide more details about the process of transferring the funds? How would you like to proceed with this arrangement?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brenda
